mapper.select: select * from user_menu as ur left join sys_menu as m on ur.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} order by m.order_num asc
select m.menu_id, m.title, m.path, m.icon FROM user_menu as ur left join sys_menu as m on ur.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and type = '1' order by m.order_num asc
select m.code FROM user_menu as ur left join sys_menu as m on ur.menu_id = m.menu_id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and type = '2' order by m.order_num asc
select m.menu_id, m.title, m.path, m.icon from sys_menu as m where type ='1' order by m.order_num asc
select m.code from sys_menu as m where type ='2' order by m.order_num asc
